name: RECCO® TECHNOLOGY WATER AND WIND PROTECTION DOWN JACKET SKI COLLECTION
description:
Technical waterproof and windbreaker down jacket with thermal insulation for cold climates. Withstands penetration of strong winds and maximum water pressure up to 15,000 mm. Made with 80% down and 20% feather fill with 750 fill power for heat insulation, allowing for thermal comfort in cold conditions within the temperature range specific to low activity 48.2ºF (9 ºC) and moderate activity 1.4ºF (-17 ºC) when snowboarding or skiing. Designed with a breathable fabric, which helps to release water vapor from sweat to the outside during moderate activity. Heat-sealed seams that reinforce protection against snow and rain. Equipped with RECCO®* technology to help rescue professionals find you in case of an accident, avalanche, or getting lost in difficult-to-reach areas.

High collar with interior elastic strap to secure scarf. Removable adjustable elastic drawstring hood. Long sleeves with lift ticket pocket and anti-blizzard inner cuffs with thumbholes and adhesive straps. Reflective rib at cuffs to increase visibility in the dark. Adjustable ventilation at underarms with hidden in-seam zip closure.

Interior and exterior pocket for cell phone with glasses cleaner. Stretch belt attached with snap buttons and clip closure. Front ring on loop to attach gloves and interior straps to hang the jacket from the shoulders. Front pockets with polar fleece interior lining and zip closure. Interior mesh pocket for gloves. 

Hidden side zippers at hem for improved comfort, movement, and ventilation. Detachable inner blizzard skirt with zipper, and adjustable to prevent cold air from entering. Waterproof double runner front zipper closure.

*For more information about RECCO® technology, please visit their website: www.recco.com

Adjustable zippered hem with patch appliqué reinforcement to prevent friction caused by ski and snowboard equipment. Hem is longer in back to accommodate ski boots. Interior elastic cuffs with hook to tuck into footwear and keep out snow and cold. Front zip and flap closure with interior fleece lining to protect the face.

*For more information about RECCO® technology, please visit their website: www.recco.com

name: RECCO® TECHNOLOGY SKI COLLECTION WATER AND WIND PROTECTION JUMPSUIT
description:
Technical waterproof and windbreaker jumpsuit with thermal insulation for cold climates. Withstands high protection against wind penetration and maximum water pressure up to 9,000 mm. Made with 80% down and 20% feather fill with 750 fill power for heat insulation, allowing for thermal comfort in cold conditions within the temperature range specific to low activity (13 ºC) and moderate activity (-10 ºC) when snowboarding or skiing. Designed with highly breathable fabric to increase air flow and keep the body cool. Pants with soft fleece lining to provide extra warmth and comfort. Equipped with RECCO®* technology to help rescue professionals find you in case of an accident, avalanche, or getting lost in difficult-to-reach areas.

High collar with contrasting interior lining. Long sleeves with lift ticket pocket and anti-blizzard inner cuffs with thumbholes. Mesh vents at the underarms with hidden zipper closure. Front pockets with waterproof zippers with rubber protectors. Interior pocket with glasses cleaner. Front ring on loop to hang gloves. Adjustable waist with side flaps. Adjustable zippered hem with patch appliqué reinforcement to prevent friction caused by ski and snowboard equipment. Hem is longer in back to accommodate ski boots. Interior elastic cuffs with hook to tuck into footwear and keep out snow and cold. Front waterproof zipper closure.

*For more information about RECCO® technology, please visit their website: www.recco.com

name: RECCO® TECHNOLOGY SKI COLLECTION WATER AND WIND PROTECTION JUMPSUIT
description:
Technical waterproof and windbreaker jumpsuit with thermal insulation for cold climates. Withstands high protection against wind penetration and maximum water pressure up to 9,000 mm. Made with 80% down and 20% feather fill with 750 fill power for heat insulation, allowing for thermal comfort in cold conditions within the temperature range specific to low activity 53.6ºF (12 ºC) and moderate activity -4ºF (-12 ºC) when snowboarding or skiing. Designed with a breathable fabric, which helps to release water vapor from sweat to the outside during moderate activity. Pants with soft fleece lining to provide extra warmth and comfort. Waterproof zippers with rubber protectors. Equipped with RECCO®* technology to help rescue professionals find you in case of an accident, avalanche, or getting lost in difficult-to-reach areas.

High collar and long sleeves with lift ticket pocket and anti-blizzard inner cuffs with thumbholes. Mesh vents at the underarms with hidden zipper closure. Front zip pockets. Interior pocket with glasses cleaner. Front ring on loop to hang gloves. Adjustable waistband with side tongues and snap buttons. Adjustable zippered hem with patch appliqué reinforcement to prevent friction caused by ski and snowboard equipment. Hem is longer in back to accommodate ski boots. Interior elastic cuffs with hook to tuck into footwear and keep out snow and cold. Front zip and flap closure with interior fleece lining to protect the face.

name: WATERPROOF AND WIND PROTECTION GLOVES SKI COLLECTION
description:
Waterproof and windbreaker technical gloves with thermal insulation for cold climates and fleece lining. Withstands penetration of strong winds and maximum water pressure up to 7,500 mm.

Zippered pocket for ski pass and hook to store it. Elastic cuffs. Adjustable security strap closure. Thicker design in areas of wear and tear.

name: HELMET SKI COLLECTION
description:
The helmet features a matte dome and an aerodynamic design. Adjustable ventilation system that creates optimal and adjustable air flow. Quilted ear muffs. Detachable interior lining with adhesive straps. Adjustable chin strap with quick release snap and size adjustment system. Equipped with RECCO®* technology to help rescue professionals find you in case of an accident, avalanche, or getting lost in difficult-to-reach areas. Includes mini bag.

*For more information about RECCO® technology, please visit their website: www.recco.com

name: EBONY WOOD EDP 100 ML (3.4 FL.OZ)
description:

Created by Jo Malone CBE, founder of Jo Loves.

name: FLEUR DE PATCHOULI EDP 100 ML (3.4 FL. OZ)
description: Eau de parfum. Designed by Jo Malone CBE, founder of Jo Loves, this is a sophisticated fragrance that combines earthy and floral notes. It opens with patchouli and bergamot, followed by peony and clary sage heart notes. Its base of musk and guaiac wood offers a warm and enveloping finish.

name: WATERLILY TEA DRESS EDP 100 ML (3.4 FL. OZ)
description:
Eau de parfum. A fresh and vibrant fragrance that combines the citrus spark of bergamot and neroli, an herbal heart of sage, mint, and basil, and a warm and enveloping base of ambroxan and musk. An expression of energy and modernity.

Created by Jo Malone CBE, founder of Jo Loves.

name: FLEUR D' ORANGER EDP 100 ML (3.4 FL. OZ)
description: Eau de parfum. Designed by Jo Malone CBE, founder of Jo Loves, this captivating fragrance combines fresh and floral notes. It opens with bergamot and orange blossom, followed by neroli and ylang ylang heart notes. The base notes offer a soft, sensual finish, ideal for those seeking an expression of modern elegance.

name: VETIVER PAMPLEMOUSSE EDP 100 ML (3.4 FL. OZ)
description:

name: EXCLUSIVE / N 04 LEATHER JARDIN EDP 100 ML (3.4 FL. OZ)
description: Eau de parfum. An elegant fragrance designed by Jo Malone CBE, founder of Jo Loves. It opens with grapefruit followed by rose and settles on a leather accord for a refined finish.

name: RED ZARA TEMPTATION TOBACCO EXTRAIT DE PARFUM 50 ML (1.7 FL. OZ)
description: Extrait de parfum, 35% concentrated. Presenting Tobacco Extrait, a bold reinterpretation of our iconic Red Temptation. Experience the intoxicating burst of spicy tobacco notes, illuminated by the delicate sweetness of fresh pink pepper and our iconic saffron, while an opulent sambac jasmine blends with a fiery rockrose flower to create a delicious and intense trail.

name: RED ZARA TEMPTATION SANDALWOOD EXTRAIT DE PARFUM 50 ML (1.7 FL. OZ)
description: Extrait de parfum, 35% concentrated. Presenting Sandalwood Extrait, a sublime and elevated reinterpretation of our iconic Red Temptation. Elegant and intense sandalwood takes center stage, enhanced by refined touches of spiced white pepper and saffron. A delicate, powdery veil of violet and iris heighten the deep woody blend of sophisticated white sandalwood, ambergris, and a creamy and irresistible tonka bean.

name: RED ZARA TEMPTATION VANILLE EXTRAIT DE PARFUM 50 ML (1.7 FL. OZ)
description: Extrait de parfum, 35% concentrated. Presenting Vanille Extrait, the maximum expression of our iconic Red Temptation, an intensified fragrance that magnifies its essence. A symphony of spices with saffron as a stand-out, enriched with luxurious cacao and a great amount of vanilla. The radiant floral sensuality of jasmine and vanilla orchid evolve to perfection toward a potent fusion of vanilla and amber, creating an irresistible and unforgettable charm.

name: RED ZARA TEMPTATION EDP 80 ML (2.71 FL. OZ)
description: An eau de parfum dressed up with the warm and textural notes of precious saffron and coriander, bitter orange provides a fruity and colorful touch to the luminous floral bouquet. The brightness of jasmine reveals all the sensuality and femininity of white flowers, enhanced by a praline accord, modern and highly addictive. The flowers highlight the potency of moss and woody amber notes, wrapped in a musky cloud, leaving a wake of complete femininity.

name: RED ZARA TEMPTATION ELIXIR PARFUM 80 ML (2.7 FL. OZ)
description: Perfume. An elixir with a highly concentrated, exquisite fragrance where the notes from our classic Red Temptation appear, leaving an explosion in its wake of spices like saffron, bitter orange, bringing a fruity and colorful touch, and the brightness of jasmine, where all the sensuality and femininity of white flowers are revealed.

name: RED ZARA TEMPTATION WINTER EDP 80 ML (2.7 FL. OZ)
description:
Eau de parfum. In this winter version of Red Temptation, orange shines through with a touch of fruit, and flowers stand out thanks to the musk and woody amber accords. Sophisticated, opulent, and long-lasting on the skin.

Smelling notes: saffron, orange, praline, vanilla, leather, amber, musk, cedar, patchouli.
Intensity: medium.
An aromatic, warm, and spicy fragrance with permanence and a long trail.

name: ROSE GOURMAND EDP 80 ML (2.71 FL. OZ)
description: Eau de parfum with the spiced nuances of carnation, the luminous radiance of jasmine, the ethereal tenderness of peony. Everything is there to adorn and emphasize the rose with modern freshness and bold character! Far from the incarnations of innocence and purity, it symbolizes and animates an incomparable swell of feminine empowerment and brings with it the pure pleasure every woman has a right to. The gourmand notes of caramel, soft, delicious, and creamy, meld together with a delicious and suspended vanilla taste and establish the ultimate power of the rose in a trail of musky amber.

name: AMBER FUSION EDP 80 ML (2.71 FL. OZ)
description: Eau de parfum where the citric freshness of bergamot and mandarin mix with marine notes for a dazzling introduction and a cheerful fluidity that plays to stay around with colorful and bright nuances of red berries. In the middle, the floral delicateness and clarity of lily of the valley contrasts with the sunny and hypnotic bouquet of ylang ylang. This multifaceted floral duet is accompanied by an intense and generous base where the sophisticated woody notes soften in contact with an overdose of amber.

name: SUBLIME EPOQUE EDP 80 ML (2.71 FL. OZ)
description: Eau de parfum that gives tribute to a sublime and radiant femininity. In the middle, a bright floral bouquet composed of jasmine, tuberose and orange blossom that enlivens when in contact with the natural notes of bergamot. Vanilla and cedar interweave to create a warm and addictive base.

description: Eau de parfum. The Intense version of our bestseller, it is a fascinating and enveloping fragrance. description: Eau de parfum. The Intense version of our bestseller Orchid, a captivating and delicate fragrance. Notes of bergamot mingle with the sweetness of praline and peach, creating a fruity and gourmand aroma. The base notes of amber and musk bring a warm and irresistible touch, leaving behind an intense and seductive trail.

name: GARDENIA INTENSE EDP 90 ML (3.04 FL. OZ)
description: Eau de parfum. The Intense version of our bestseller Gardenia, it is an enveloping fragrance with a velvety touch. Bright notes of white jasmine highlight the floral heart of orange blossom and gardenia, while an intense patchouli accord adds depth and sophistication.

name: VETIVER PAMPLEMOUSSE ELIXIR PARFUM 60 ML (2.3 FL. OZ)
description:
Elixir of Vetiver Pamplemousse is a more intense and long-lasting version of the eau de parfum, a woody fragrance that highlights the glowing warmth of amber and the vibrant freshness of mandarin, creating a sophisticated and harmonious contrast.

Created by Jo Malone CBE, founder of Jo Loves.

name: FASHIONABLY LONDON ELIXIR EDP 60 ML (2.3 FL. OZ)
description:

Created by Jo Malone CBE, founder of Jo Loves.

name: ENERGETICALLY NEW YORK ELIXIR PARFUM 60 ML (2.3 FL. OZ)

Created by Jo Malone CBE, founder of Jo Loves.

name: WATERLILY TEA DRESS ELIXIR PARFUM 60 ML (2.3 FL. OZ)

Created by Jo Malone CBE, founder of Jo Loves.

name: ZARA RED SPARKLE NAIL WRAPS - Gel Nails Effect
description:
Gel nail stickers for a premium and easy at-home manicure.

Instructions for use:
Wash hands with soap and then dry to ensure proper product adherence.
Apply the nail stickers.

Can be used directly on clean skin for a natural “makeup-free” look or combined with your face and lip makeup.

Perfect to keep your makeup fresh all day with just a simple touch.

- Enhances the natural tone of your skin based on your pH. 
- Unique, natural-finish tint. 
- Suitable for all skin shades. 
- Easy to apply just using the fingertips.

name: TRIANGULAR POWDER PUFF
description: Velvety triangular powder puff to apply powder. This powder puff is ideal for touching up and sealing your makeup.

name: RETRACTABLE KABUKI BRUSH
description: Dense brush with soft, short bristles, ideal for applying liquid foundation for instant coverage and a flawless finish. Designed in a retractable case ideal for carrying in your purse or toiletry bag.
